name: Starfighter Pilot
description:
Starfighter Pilot

Use your state of the art Starfighter to shoot down enemy satellites. Inspired from the always forgotten game from the early 2000's, burnedsky, this game puts you in charge of the best machinery to take down rogue satellites in your space.

Arrow keys to navigate and Spacebar to shoot!

This game was made in an hour tops-assets and everything. Development is underway!
